item.title: By: I’ve Got a Secret | Joseph Scott's Blog

item.description: [...] My blog doesn’t really count for this, in another few decades no one will care what day Yahoo bought Flickr, that the maximum row size of SQL Server 2000 is 8060 bytes or how to use CSS opacity in Internet [...]
